attributes.action: have a different logo designed to advertise the 2012 London Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current logo, as you have probably seen, is simply awful and it cost £400,000 to produce. Not only do many people find it dated, it also looks as though it was designed and made by a young child.

On several forums and discussion groups, the logo has been mocked, since it looks as though it is made of two people who are performing a "sexual act". Not exactly a good image to portray of London and the rest of the United Kingdom!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
